entries.arrival_phase_1: Scanning system for the escaping pirate. Standby to proceed with destroying his ship.
entries.arrival_phase_2: Nav location to the target vessel has been located. Proceed with extreme prejudice.
entries.assassinate_success: Good work, pilot. No one escapes from the Empire's mighty grasp. Return to the station commander.
entries.destroy_escort: Just to be safe take out the escort fighters as well. We cannot be to careful with this situation.
entries.escort_remaining: pcontrast1 Tactical Computer:pcontrast3 <%DI escort fighters remaining.>
entries.escort_wiped_out: pcontrast1 Tactical Computer:pcontrast3 <Enemy escort fighter eliminated.>
entries.failed_escape: You let him get away! Pray that we can get another fix on his location or this will failure be reflected on your performance review. Report your failure to the station commander.
entries.quest_escort_d: Make sure that all of the escaping pirate's escort fighters are destroyed as well. Once you have completed this task return to the station commander.
entries.quest_location_d: Remain in the Dathomir system and eliminate the escaping Black Sun pirate.
entries.quest_target_d: Intercept the escaping Black Sun pirate and kill him. He cannot be allowed to escape and must be an example for others.
entries.quest_target_t: Destroy the Escaping Black Sun Pirate
entries.title: Dathomir System: Eliminate the Escaping Black Sun Pirate
entries.title_d: The captive Black Sun pirate has somehow escaped. Track him down and destroy him before he makes good on his getaway.
